original_text: But, because he himself does wrong things, he must offer sacrifices to God on behalf of himself, as well as on behalf of the people.
korean_text: 그러므로 백성을 위하여 속죄제를 드림과 같이 또한 자신을 위하여도 드리는 것이 마땅하니라

sentences.original_text: But, because he himself does wrong things
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그 자신이 잘못된 일을 하기 때문에

sentences.original_text: he must offer sacrifices to God
as well as on behalf of the people
